rootCause: Repeated KiBot runs could not import the KiCad 9 `pcbnew` module because KiCad was never provisioned on ad-hoc hosts. Whenever electronics commits touched KiCad assets, the helper script only warned about the missing dependency so exports failed across the listed windows.
resolution: Teach scripts/checks.sh to detect KiCad or KiBot assets in flight and automatically install KiCad 9 (via the official apt repository or Homebrew). If provisioning still fails the script stops immediately, ensuring missing dependencies are fixed before rerunning KiBot.
